lead_paragraph: Advertisers were urged yesterday to "put farming on the front line" by dramatizing the important role of food in total war and by acknowledging the farmer's contribution to victory. In a joint appeal by the War Advertising Council and the Department of Agriculture, advertisers were told they could help elevate farm produce to its rightful place in American thinking, on the same level of war importance with guns, planes, tanks and ships.
abstract: Asks advertisers to stress wartime food role, brochure
